author: Nintendo of America
description:
Rain World: The Watcher is now available on Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/rain-world-the-watcher-70050000059185-switch/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1021-01&utm_id=P1021-01  

Play as a slugcat who navigates through ripples of time and space while keeping out of sight of treacherous creatures. Will you follow where the strings lead you, or completely decimate them and the regions around you? 

#RainWorld #NintendoSwitch  

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

title: Rain World: The Watcher – Launch Trailer – Nintendo Switch

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Hades II – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition and Hades II are available now on Nintendo Switch 2 & Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/hades-ii-nintendo-switch-2-edition-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1076-01&utm_id=P1076-01  
 
Battle beyond the Underworld vs. the Titan of Time in the sequel to the award-winning god-like rogue-like from Supergiant Games.  

Hades II – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition takes advantage of the new Nintendo Switch 2 hardware, offering up 120 frames-per-second performance at 1080p while playing in TV Mode. In Handheld Mode, the game runs at 60 frames-per-second at 1080p, while the Nintendo Switch version runs at 60 frames-per-second at 720p in both modes. Players who purchase the Nintendo Switch version may download a free upgrade to the Nintendo Switch 2 version if they have both consoles. 

That’s not all, be on the lookout for the Physical Edition coming on Nov 20, 2025.  

#HadesII #NintendoSwitch #NintendoSwitch2 

V
title: Hades II – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition – Launch Trailer
